page.title: 12LIFE IN PENNYWELL
page.content: Japanese clock radio, pop posters on the walls, pop music on the radio, vacuum cleaners, electric milk float,postman delivers mail, Colgate toothpaste, Wisdom toothbrush, gas central heating, breakfast t.v., Japanese t.v. set,Cornflakes, Sugar Puffs, toast and coffee for breakfast,school uniform of blouse, skirt and tie,Pod sandals, Venetian blinds, double glazing, hair styling mousse, curling tongs for styling, school-ugh!, smell of bread at the bakers, fish and chips for dinner,fire engine sirens, playing Pac-man on the computer, Top of the Pops on the video, reading Smash Hits magazine, Dallas on t.v.,Bruce Springsteen on record, Sunderland Leisure centre for ice skating, swimming and meeting the boys. Yellow double decker back home.
